original_title: Wolves: A Legend Returns to Yellowstone
overview: This classic, beloved National Geographic special was four years in the making and this amazing film invites you to run with the pack for a wolf's-eye-view. Witness the unfolding saga of hardships and affection, losses and triumphs, and the controversy surrounding the decision to reintroduce wolves back into the heart of the West.
title: Wolves: A Legend Returns to Yellowstone
